tool_description: Lookup geographical location data like country code, state and city by IPv4 or IPv6 address.
name: DB-IP IP Geolocation
title: DB-IP IP Geolocation

api_list.name: Key Information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dbip.p.rapidapi.com/keyinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dbip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dbip.p.rapidapi.com/keyinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dbip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
